Uses of Interface
com.software.reuze.al_i_Learner

  • Packages that use al_i_Learner 
    Package Description
    com.software.reuze  

    • Uses of al_i_Learner in com.software.reuze

      Classes in com.software.reuze that implement al_i_Learner 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  al_CurrentBest
      Implements the CURRENT-BEST-LEARNING algorithm from page 771, AIMAv3.
      class  al_LearnerAdaBoost
      Implements ADABOOST algorithm from page 751, AIMAv3.
      class  al_LearnerDecisionList
      Uses DECISION-LIST-LEARNING algorithm, page 717, AIMAv3, to build a series of tests (DecisionListTest); the chain of tests is used to predict outcomes for new examples.
      class  al_LearnerDecisionTree
      Uses DECISION-TREE-LEARNING from page 702, AIMAv3, to induce decision trees (see DecisionTree).
      class  al_LearnerDecisionTreeStump
      Used by ADA-BOOST as a hypothesis, page 750, AIMAv3.
      class  al_LearnerMajority<E>
      Not directly explained in AIMAv3, but indirectly referenced by the majority function, page 731, and the randomized weighted majority algorithm, page 758.
      class  al_LearnerNeuralNetwork 
      class  al_LearnerWeightedMajority
      Implied by and used in ADABOOST, this learner, an ensemble hypothesis, is "a weighted-majority combination of all the K hypothesis, each weighted according to how well it performed on the training set" page 749, AIMAv3.
      Methods in com.software.reuze that return al_i_Learner 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      al_i_Learner[] al_LearnerWeightedMajority.getHypotheses()
      Return hypotheses
      Method parameters in com.software.reuze with type arguments of type al_i_Learner 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      al_LearnerWeightedMajority al_LearnerAdaBoost.adaBoost(al_Examples examples, Class<? extends al_i_Learner> L, int K)
      Train the learners according to page 751, AIMAv3.
